Name: Aletta - Visual Novel
About the game: An adventure visual novel with a pixel art style. About ghosts, past love, and a world of the unconscious. It has a simple click-to-advance mechanic, with minimalistic controls. Will you follow the scent of spider lilies, or will you ride again the engine steam? Or maybe, both?
